thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 6 of 599
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: Had a very nice experience. Very nice people helping me to do something that I haven't had to do before. Professional with a sense of humor which may not be important to some, but important to me. All my questions and concerns were answered immediately. Am looking forward to doing business with your company in Gladstone, Mo. I will recommend your facility to my friends. Thank you
